section_info.title: Sessions and Events
section_info.details: A formal record of delivered technical workshops and professional training sessions focused on programming and machine learning. These engagements involve the facilitation of digital research training and academic seminars designed for diverse audiences within the tertiary and research sectors.

sessionsevents.title: Seminar Speaker
sessionsevents.organization: CSE Club, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science and Technology University (HSTU)
sessionsevents.description: Presented a talk at 'A seminar on Higher Studies in Abroad - Journey to Australia and Research Experiences'.

sessionsevents.title: Keynote Speaker
sessionsevents.organization: AFCSE, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science and Technology University (HSTU)
sessionsevents.description: Delivered keynotes at 'A seminar on career development and the future of mobile app development in Bangladesh'.
